撦字的基本解释

撦
chě
同“扯”。

撦字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chě］
［《廣韻》昌者切，上馬，昌。］
同“扯1”。
(1)《正字通·手部》：“扯，俗撦字。”撕裂。
(2)《正字通·手部》：“扯，俗撦字。”拉。
(3)《正字通·手部》：“扯，俗撦字。”闲谈。

撦字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　撦； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页455第12
【唐韻】【正韻】昌者切【集韻】【韻會】齒者切，?車上聲。裂開也。【博雅】撦坼，啓開也。【劉克莊題跋】溫李諸人，困于撏撦。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chě]
["Guangyun" prosperous people cut, go on horse, prosper. ]
Same as "pull 1".
(1) "Zhengzitong·Hand": "Tear, vulgar word." Tearing.
(2) "Zhengzitong·Shoubu": "Pull, vulgar word." Pull.
(3) "Zhengzitong·Shoubu": "Tough, vulgar words." Chat.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　撦; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 455 No. 12
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Those who are prosperous will cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme will] Those who cut their teeth, sound on the car. Cracked also. [Bo Ya] Sit down, open it. [Liu Kezhuang postscript] All the people of Wen and Li are trapped in 撏撦.
